function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Increased hunting and harvesting pressure on domestic animals and wildlife due to covid-related societal changes","Postponement or cancellation of research, monitoring, and training/education programs in the conservation sector due to global reduction in mobility","Declines in travel and tourism revenue affecting conservation funding","Novel zoonotic disease transmission","Premature death of conservationists due to covid-19","Reduction in conservation funding and government commitments due to economic downturn","Declines in conservation revenue and capacity, livelihood and trade disruptions","Vulnerabilities in social and economic models supporting conservation efforts","Covid-19 outbreak causing factory shutdowns and reduced production","Supply chain vulnerability due to reliance on suppliers from countries with more covid-19 cases","Air and ocean freight crunch due to lack of flights and container imbalance","Disruption and closure of businesses in the sports, travel, tourism, and hospitality industries","Job reductions in the travel and tourism industry due to global travel bans","Spread of sars-cov-2 and covid-19","Spread of the virus due to economic instability and behavioral changes leading to cultural and lifestyle changes","Hardships faced by smes in sectors with high public interaction","Increase in credit guarantee ratio during the emergency stage of covid-19","Varying credit guarantee ratios for different countries and banks","High loan default risk ratio npl/l","Impact of covid-19 on gdp growth affecting npl/l of banks in asean countries","Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion","Empirical study based on theoretical model","Lack of appropriate lending technology for credit-rationed smes","Lack of academic study on the impact of covid-19 on asean economies","Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment","Unclear legal basis for pseudonymization conversions","Inadequate data governance and quality control","Suboptimal data science literacy in the health sector","Delays in authorization of clinical trials and studies by national regulatory bodies"],"non-risks":["Complex conservation outcomes of non-covid-19 perturbations","Dependence on author expertise may introduce bias in case study selection","Unverified anticipated outcomes may lead to inaccurate conclusions","Limited representation of conservation settings and cultures in case study selection","The focus on perturbations with major social, political, economic, and/or ecological impacts may include contagious diseases like covid-19","Environmental, economic, and societal changes","Neglect of major conservation issues during the pandemic","Lack of systematic initiatives and government interventions","Desire for autonomy, wealth, power, status, and personal achievement in entrepreneurship","Inadequate preparation of socio-economic systems for future shocks","Heightened focus on resilience","Lack of supportive infrastructure for entrepreneurship universities, science parks, incubators","Lack of prioritization of investigations and surveillance activities","Inadequate understanding of movement dynamics and demographics","Rising parasite carriage by human travellers","Influence of human mobility on the spatial impact of interventions","Heterogeneous pattern of impact targeting surveillance and control","Lack of travel histories in case data raising the possibility of infections acquired away from the location of residence","Uncertain accuracy of risk mapping approach","Exportation of parasites to other locations","Lack of prioritization of investigations and surveillance activities","Lack of travel history information from patients","Inadequate understanding of human movement patterns","Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment","Unclear legal basis for pseudonymization conversions","Inadequate data governance and quality control","Suboptimal data science literacy in the health sector","Delays in authorization of clinical trials and studies by national regulatory bodies"]}
